The license (Mozilla version 1.0) can be read at the MMBase site. See http://www.mmbase.org/license

section.title: Miscellaneous
section.subtitle: Miscellaneous features of MMBase.
section.para: This folder contains information regarding several features of MMBase. Normally documentation in this folder will describe a certains aspect of MMBase from a feature-centric view point, rather then from a user-centric view point.
